desc: Luxurious home decor, accessories and gifts created and curated to awaken inner royalty and inspire transcendent living surrounded by beauty and grace. Elevated designs on exquisite, natural fabrics and materials, ethically-sourced from artisans around the world, infused with meaning and faith.

layout.text: Wrap yourself and those you love in the warmth of luxurious cashmere, with the addition of a holy medal delicately stitched onto your scarf or wrap, a reminder of how loved and royal you are...the all season shawl that keeps you wrapped in Grace!
